abstract: A look at what Secretary Geithner is telling Congress and the public today.
snippet: A look at what Secretary Geithner is telling Congress and the public today.
lead_paragraph: It’s Bailout Tuesday, with the Treasury secretary announcing the outlines of his bailout plan. The first post, at the bottom, commented on his speech. Later posts discussed the Senate Finance Committee hearing, with the most recent at the top. (My colleague Catherine Rampell live-blogged the testimony by Ben S. Bernanke, the Fed chairman, before a House committee.)
